title: Episode 37: Passing Notes
itunes:title: Episode 37: Passing Notes
description:
For as crowded as this world has become, most people feel isolated and alone. Perhaps that’s why so many of us believe that there’s another world, just beyond the veil. But when that veil is tampered with and pulled aside, it’s hard to say what might emerge.

* * *

This episode of Lore was sponsored by:

Stamps: Print your own postage and shipping labels from your home or office. Start your free 4-week trial today, and claim your $110 bonus offer, which includes postage and a digital scale. Just visit Stamps.com, click on the microphone in the top-right of the homepage, and type LORE.

Audible: Read on the go. Choose from over 180,000 amazing audio productions today, and begin your free 30-day trial membership with a free book of your choice by visiting Audible.com/Lore. If you need a book recommendation, check out my latest thriller, Grave Suspicion.

Foot Cardigan: Life is too short to wear boring socks. Get one new pair of fun, colorful socks delivered to your front door every month. Start your subscritpion today at FootCardigan.com/lore, and use coupon code LORE1 to save 10%.

* * *
